about_the_game:
Long time no see, brothers.
We have been busy making the game system for Glass 2. Now We're going to start a new game activity.

This is Another story of 'GLASS' in cute SD.
Let's solve the puzzle and enjoy Lena, Eily, and Celestina's cute daily life.
Welcome to the world of Petit GLASS 2!

'Petit GLASS' is a game about the cute daily lives of Heroines in the glass world.
This is a side story of GLASS, designed to repay the support of customers who buy our game.
In addition, you can get a glimpse of the fragmentary story of Glass 2, the latest series of Glass currently in production.

'Petit Glass 2' can be searched on Google, and you can send URL addresses to your friends.
It's still indirect. Feel free to send your address to your friends and recommend 'GLASS WORLD' to them.

Please have fun,
